original_solution_mapping.L1: He feeds each horse 2*20=<<2*20=40>>40 pounds of food a day
original_solution_mapping.L2: So he uses 40*25=<<40*25=1000>>1000 pounds of food a day
original_solution_mapping.L3: That means in 60 days he uses 60*1000=<<60*1000=60000>>60000 pounds of food
original_solution_mapping.L4: Each bag of food is 2000*.5=<<2000*.5=1000>>1000 pounds
original_solution_mapping.L5: So he needs to buy 60000/1000=<<60000/1000=60>>60 bags of food

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6097.
    Returns: the number of half-ton bags of food John needs to buy.
    """
    # L1
    feedings_per_day = 2 # feeds each horse twice a day
    food_per_feeding = 20 # feeds them 20 pounds of food at each feeding
    food_per_horse_per_day = feedings_per_day * food_per_feeding

    # L2
    num_horses = 25 # John has 25 horses
    total_food_per_day = food_per_horse_per_day * num_horses

    # L3
    num_days = 60 # in 60 days
    total_food_needed = num_days * total_food_per_day

    # L4
    pounds_per_ton = 2000 # WK
    bag_size_tons = 0.5 # half ton bags of food
    pounds_per_bag = pounds_per_ton * bag_size_tons

    # L5
    num_bags_to_buy = total_food_needed / pounds_per_bag

    # FA
    answer = num_bags_to_buy
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He feeds each horse {feedings_per_day}*{food_per_feeding}=<<{feedings_per_day}*{food_per_feeding}={food_per_horse_per_day}>>{food_per_horse_per_day} pounds of food a day
So he uses {food_per_horse_per_day}*{num_horses}=<<{food_per_horse_per_day}*{num_horses}={total_food_per_day}>>{total_food_per_day} pounds of food a day
That means in {num_days} days he uses {num_days}*{total_food_per_day}=<<{num_days}*{total_food_per_day}={total_food_needed}>>{total_food_needed} pounds of food
Each bag of food is {pounds_per_ton}*{bag_size_tons}=<<{pounds_per_ton}*{bag_size_tons}={pounds_per_bag}>>{pounds_per_bag} pounds
So he needs to buy {total_food_needed}/{pounds_per_bag}=<<{total_food_needed}/{pounds_per_bag}={num_bags_to_buy}>>{num_bags_to_buy} bags of food
